channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Latto & Ice Spice Squash Beef, Share “Gyatt”
item.description: Spilling the tea ☕️ Latto & Ice Spice put the drama aside to drop a 🔥 collab, "Gyatt"! 🎶 #MusicNews

item.title: Gorillaz Debuted A Whole New Album And Brought Out Sparks & Johnny Marr At House Of Kong Closer
item.description: 🎉 Gorillaz unveiled a fresh album and lit up House of Kong with Sparks & Johnny Marr! 🎶 #livemusic #gorillazband

item.title: Slipknot Land First Entry Into Spotify’s 1 Billion Streams Club with “Duality”
item.description: 🔥 Slipknot’s “Duality” hits 1 billion streams on Spotify! 🎉 Let's keep headbanging to this iconic track! 🤘#Slipknot #1BillionStreams

item.title: Tame Impala share new single “Loser”: watch video ft. Joe Keery (Djo)
item.description: Dive into the groovy vibes with Tame Impala's fresh single "Loser" featuring Joe Keery! 🎶✨ #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Radiohead Officially Announce 2025 Tour: “Who Knows Where This Will All Lead”
item.description: 🎉🎶 Radiohead is hitting the road in 2025 with a mysterious tour theme - who's ready for the ride? 🚀 #RadioheadTour2025

item.title: Young Thug Claims He Purchased $50,000 Worth of Streams for Gunna’s ‘DS4EVER’ Album
item.description: Young Thug out here flexing for his bro Gunna! 💸🎶 #StreamGoals #DS4EVER

item.title: Arthur Hanlon, Carlos Vives & Goyo Bring Their Blues-Cumbia Fusion to ‘The Tonight Show’: Watch
item.description: 🎵 Get ready to dance with the ultimate Latin fusion on @FallonTonight! 💃 #LatinMusic #BluesCumbia #TonightShowTrios 🎶

item.title: Nickelback and Tim McGraw Turn Field of Dreams Movie Site Into Concert Heaven: Review + Photos
item.description: Rock meets country in the cornfields! 🎸🌾 Nickelback and Tim McGraw transform Field of Dreams into a concert paradise! 🤠🤘 #MusicMagic

item.title: Jonas Brothers Surprise Dallas Show With Kelsea Ballerini Duets
item.description: 🌟 Dallas got double the fun with Jonas Brothers and Kelsea Ballerini duets! Who else wishes they were there? 🎤🎸 #MusicMagic

item.title: Miguel Finally Announces New Album Caos
item.description: 🎉 Miguel is back with new music vibes! Get ready to dance to the rhythm of 'Caos'! 🎶 #Miguel #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Fugees Rapper Pras Michel Has Emergency Surgery For Colon Cancer, Delaying Federal Criminal Case
item.description: Sending positive vibes to Pras Michel 🙏 Wishing him a speedy recovery! #GetWellSoon #FugeesStrong 💪🎶

item.title: David Byrne Reveals He’s ‘Getting Married’ This Week, Shares Playlist
item.description: Love is in the air! 💕🎶 David Byrne's wedding playlist is the ultimate mood-booster! Check it out now! #MusicNews #DavidByrne

item.title: The Dambuilders Play First Show In 28 Years At DromFest With Members Of Fugazi, Luna, & Dexys
item.description: Guess who's back after 28 years?! 🎸 The Dambuilders are rocking out at DromFest with special guests from Fugazi, Luna, and Dexys! 🤘 #MusicLegends #DromFestBound

item.title: Oasis brought Britpop classics, bucket hats & fireworks to Metlife Stadium (Night 1 review, pics, setlist)
item.description: Oasis lit up Metlife Stadium with Britpop magic, bucket hats, and fireworks! 🎶💥 #RockOn #BritpopLegends

item.title: Watch Fifth Harmony Reunite at a Jonas Brothers Concert
item.description: 💃🎤 When Fifth Harmony surprised fans at the Jonas Brothers concert! Squad goals unlocked! #MusicalMagic✨ #ReunionVibes

item.title: Fans Choose Baylee Lynn’s ‘Cautiously Optimistic’ as This Week’s Favorite New Music
item.description: 🎶 Baylee Lynn's 'Cautiously Optimistic' wins hearts this week! 🌟 Which track is on repeat for you? #NewMusicDiscovery 🎧

item.title: The Weeknd’s ‘Blinding Lights’ Becomes First Song to Hit 5 Billion Streams on Spotify
item.description: 🎉 The Weeknd's 'Blinding Lights' lights up Spotify with 5 billion streams! 🔥🎶 #RecordBreaker #TheWeeknd

item.title: Here Are All the K-pop Albums That Have Topped the Billboard 200: Full List
item.description: 🌟 K-pop domination on the Billboard 200! 🎶 Check out which albums made it to the top! 🎉 #KpopWin #Billboard200

item.title: Lady Gaga to Perform at VMAs 2025
item.description: 🚀 Gaga's back at it! Catch her electrifying performance at the VMAs 2025! 🎤 #LadyGaga #VMAs2025

item.title: Halsey Announces BADLANDS 10th Anniversary Tour: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎉 Join Halsey on a musical time machine! ✨ Celebrate 10 years of BADLANDS with us! 🎶 #Halsey #BADLANDS10
